mapper.insert: insert into product (id, name, category, original_price, discount_price, stock, merchant_id, is_bargain, `condition`, description) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{discountPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{stock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{merchantId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isBargain,jdbcType=BIT}, #{condition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id, name, category, original_price, discount_price, stock, merchant_id, status, is_bargain, `condition`, description, nob from product where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
SELECT * FROM product WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') ORDER BY id
SELECT * FROM product WHERE status = #{status} ORDER BY id
